name: IBI PLAST
goal:
As part of its programme of innovation and continuous product development, IBI PLAST became the first company to manufacture compostable film and bags from Mater-Bi速 cornstarch biopolymer.
Flexibility in types, sizes and specification allows the company to supply Customers from across the public and private sectors in both Italy and throughout Europe, directly and through distributors and agents in Great Britain, France, Spain, Switzerland, Austria, Belgium, Slovenia, Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and many others.
Our core business is the production and distribution of compostable bags and carrier bags and also specially-designed bins for separate organic waste collection.
Our unique products are the exclusive open walls Bio.Box速 and Ibi.Box速 system, used widely as part of biowaste collection initiatives.
We satisfy the broad and diverse needs of our Customers by converting several thousand tons of Mater-Bi速 biopolymer, in a wide variety of products. Professionalism, product quality and Customer service are our primary goals, improved, day by day, through growing experiences.
interests: Business and Industry, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Environment initiatives, Packaging Legislation, Plastic reduction, Biodegradable and Compostable, Oxodegradable
